g.text: Int. J. Environ. Res. Public Health
health ﬁeld fulﬁlls its potential as a highly valued and proactive partner in climate policy planning
All authors contributed to the development of the paper: M.F. and M.S. conceptualized
and developed the paper; B.B., C.Z., M.F. and M.S. researched and wrote the paper; M.S. and T.B. reviewed and
This research received no external funding.
The authors declare no conﬂict of interest.
